sentences: Opening SBI 38 on Monday, 3 June, SBI Chair Tomasz Chruszczow (Poland) urged parties to look towards 2015, stressing that the SBI has to make progress here and now. UNFCCC Executive Secretary Christiana Figueres applauded the United Arab Emirates as the first party to ratify the Doha amendment to the Kyoto Protocol.
She encouraged others to follow, noting that 143 ratifications are necessary for the amendment to enter into force.
